description: No More Heroes III is an upcoming 2021 action-adventure hack-and-slash video game developed and published by Grasshopper Manufacture for Nintendo Switch. It is the fourth installment in the franchise and the third entry in the mainline No More Heroes series. After a eleven-year hiatus since No More Heroes 2, the game follows Travis Touchdown's return to Santa Destroy, as he must defend the world from an alien invasion of an incredibly powerful army led by a galactic overlord prince and his nine assassins. The game is scheduled for a worldwide release on August 27, 2021.
title: No More Heroes III
